function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to high occupancy in the faculty building","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among students and staff","Mitigation":"Implementing occupancy limits, improving ventilation, and promoting hygiene practices","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, ventilation control systems, and hand sanitizing stations","People":"Students, faculty, and staff at the Faculty of Engineering","Owner":"Faculty management and building maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the staff office","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and potential health risks for staff members","Mitigation":"Installing ventilation systems and air purifiers, and promoting regular air circulation","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, ventilation systems, and air purifiers","People":"Staff members in the office","Owner":"Office management and building maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate hygiene practices in the laboratory and classroom","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among students and faculty during classes and exams","Mitigation":"Promoting hand hygiene, providing hand sanitizing stations, and implementing cleaning protocols","Technologies":"Hand sanitizing stations, cleaning supplies, and hygiene promotion materials","People":"Students, faculty, and staff in the laboratory and classroom","Owner":"Faculty administration and teaching staff"}]}
